text:
Also, after listening to some other of the more famous songs, Sea and Beetle in particular.
I feel that those two are somewhat of a Hill and valley feel, some parts was alittle "lax", and made them sound great at times but regular otherwise.
Don't get the same feel of "loop" here.

Most of the song sounds unique and yet distinguished from the others.

Heck even sound sadistical. :P

text:
Hmm? Really? I'm shocked.
I mean don't get me wrong, I love this song! But I hear from so many people they don't really like this one's soundtrack quality and compare to plenty of horrible things.
That's why it shocks me to see this up here! Forget all the haters of the X3 soundtrack, it was awesome.
